mapper.select: select BRANCH.BRANCH_NAME, REV.* from BRANCH, (select RENT_REVIEW.BRANCH_NO, avg(RENT_REVIEW.Rent_Review_Rating_Car) as SCORE, count(*) as SALE, max(RENT_REVIEW.RENT_REVIEW_DATE) as NEW from RENT_REVIEW group by RENT_REVIEW.BRANCH_NO ) REV where REV.BRANCH_NO = BRANCH.BRANCH_NO order by BRANCH.BRANCH_NO

select BRANCH.BRANCH_NAME, REV.* from BRANCH, (select RENT_REVIEW.BRANCH_NO, avg(RENT_REVIEW.Rent_Review_Rating_Car) as SCORE, count(*) as SALE, max(RENT_REVIEW.RENT_REVIEW_DATE) as NEW from RENT_REVIEW group by RENT_REVIEW.BRANCH_NO ) REV where REV.BRANCH_NO = BRANCH.BRANCH_NO ORDER BY
SCORE SALE NEW
DESC

select BRANCH.BRANCH_NO, BRANCH.BRANCH_NAME, REV.SCORE, REV.SALE, BRANCH.BRANCH_LOCAL, BRANCH.BRANCH_TEL, BRANCH.BRANCH_BUSSPOT, BRANCH.BRANCH_BUSGAP, BRANCH.BRANCH_BUSTIME from BRANCH, (select RENT_REVIEW.BRANCH_NO, avg(RENT_REVIEW.Rent_Review_Rating_Car) as SCORE, count(*) as SALE from RENT_REVIEW group by RENT_REVIEW.BRANCH_NO ) REV where REV.BRANCH_NO = BRANCH.BRANCH_NO and BRANCH.BRANCH_NO=#{branch_no}
